Slice.help: You Slice your sword in a wide arc, attacking all enemies in front of you. Slice does less damage than Slash, but can hit multiple foes and reduces their defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Slice.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Whirling_Sword.help: You perform a Whirling Sword maneuver, attacking all foes in melee range. This attack wounds your opponents, causing them to take minor damage over time and reduces their defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Whirling_Sword.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

Ectoplasmic_Containment.help: The Ectoplasmic Containment field can capture the essence of a ghostly enemy as it dissipates.

Spectrographic_Assimilator.help: The Spectrographic Assimilator absorbs and stores the ectoplasm of any 'ghosts' that are destroyed within the containment field.

Assimilation_Overload.help: The Ghost Trap has exceeded its capacity and exploded, releasing all of its stored ectoplasm.

Ethereal.help: Spectral Pirates can make themselves Ethereal and shift out of the material plane. Ethereal Spectres are invisible, and cannot affect or be affected by those in normal space.
Ethereal.targetHelp: Spectral Pirates can make themselves Ethereal and shift out of the material plane. Ethereal Spectres are invisible, and cannot affect or be affected by those in normal space.
